page.title: 17Llandegai School
page.content: Every year Mr Jones receives a letter from the Education Authorities containing one thousand five hundred pounds to buy everything from toilet paper to exercise books, but obviously this does not go far enough.The school is not very well equipped for instance it does not have a micro-wave oven nor a minibus but it does have a BBC micro-computer.The children start school at the age of three and a half and leave at the age of eleven to go to a senior school.All of the lessons are taught in Welsh and English.Only the juniors have homework.When they finally go to the senior school they do a special exam before they leave .
